name: Fred & Jeff: Terror, Fright and Dead
name_original: Fred & Jeff: Terror, Fright and Dead
description:
Fred & Jeff: Terror, Fright and Dead is an adventure game developed by Alcachofa Soft. It came out on 01-01-2000. It was published by Zeta Multimedia. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
Fred & Jeff: Terror, Fright and Dead is available on PC.
